formattedAddress: 700 Columbus Ave, New York, NY 10025, USA
adrFormatAddress: 700 Columbus Ave, New York, NY 10025-9468, USA

originalText.text: We recently adopted our dog, Miss Molly and took her here hoping to find a solution. Molly had developed extreme itchiness and she’d lick her body day and night until exhaustion. We live in the West Village and go to our regular vet for routine checkups, but realized we needed a second option. So we carefully searched online for vet dermatologist specialists in the city and picked here as our first choice. Nice clean, professional office settings, friendly for dogs and cats, although the waiting room was packed! All staff members were passionate pet lovers and incredibly attentive to Molly. Dr. Budgin’s excellent bedside manner showed us how much she cares about not only Molly, but also us! After our first visit, we had lots to do at home, but now it's been a little over 2 weeks, and Molly is finally at peace. No more itching! 10/10 recommend! Dr. Budgin and her teams dedication and expertise deeply touched us!

originalText.text: Dr Budgin and the team are the best!. Sacha has suffered with allergies and skin issues for a 2 + years until we found Hudson Valley Vet Dermatology. Sacha’s allergies are now under control and she is one happy, healthy and  comfortable dog again. Sacha & I only wish we had found Dr Budgin sooner. Highly recommend!

text.text: Dr Budgin and the team are the best!. Sacha has suffered with allergies and skin issues for a 2 + years until we found Hudson Valley Vet Dermatology. Sacha’s allergies are now under control and she is one happy, healthy and  comfortable dog again. Sacha & I only wish we had found Dr Budgin sooner. Highly recommend!

originalText.text: My Mini Schnauzer Sweetie developed environmental allergies that resulted in atopic dermatitis. Went to see Dr. Budgin. I absolutely love the way she examined Sweetie which is super gentle and very thorough! For this, I give tons of credits and 5 stars to Dr. Budgin.  Definitely recommend to all my pet owner friends’ furry kids who also suffer skin allergy problems.  Sweetie’s skin allergy symptom is well controlled now.  Kudos to Dr. Budgin and the entire office staff.

originalText.text: This review is long overdue. Each summer, my poor dog Buddy's skin allergies flare up. He is miserable and smells bad, too! This past May, we visited Hudson Valley Vet Dermatology. Our visit went so smoothly! Dr. Budgin and the staff are so wonderful. It is clear how much everyone cares and the entire team is knowledgeable. They were aware of my entire dog's history, and asked and answered so many detailed questions. I have never seen a vet who is so empathetic and supportive. She took her time to explain and educate me on treatment options to keep Buddy's skin and ears in optimal health. Happy to report that Buddy's symptoms have decreased tremendously and he is SO much more comfortable. The treatments are working and we finally found the right doctor for him!

originalText.text:
If I could give the practice 10 stars I would! Dr Budgin is so warm and caring  and was extremely thorough in her examination of my little Boston Terrier. Her staff is great too; they did a comprehensive intake on our initial visit and Dr Budgin spent two hours with us. She took time to ask questions and  listened to all my concerns. We came to her because of my pup’s hair loss and allergies. I trust her judgement completely and am so glad I found her.
She and her staff are also very responsive to emails when I had  questions between visits. Which is reassuring to a concerned momma ;)

I would wholeheartedly recommend her for any doggie dermatology issues.
